alert.note: Alert for Walthall (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 1:59PM CDT until June 10 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL WALTHALL COUNTY... At 159 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Columbia to near Dexter, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Tylertown. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
